title: Development and Application of Online Self-Regulated Learning Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of online learning environments and self-regulated learning
context.additional_context: Development and validation of survey-based assessment tools suitable for learner groups composed of professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Participants can develop a valid survey instrument to measure self-regulated learning abilities in online environments.
Verification of measurement equivalence across groups (gender, network environment)
Establishment of personalized educational strategies through analysis of learners' self-regulated learning characteristics
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
